item.description:
Organized by the DCR:

First Day Hikes 2011
Thursday, January 1
Free hot & hearty soup at noon


Arrive at noon to have time for a soup or a hot chocolate before heading out. We will meet in the Houghton's Pond main parking lot, 840 Hillside Street in Milton at 12:30 for our Meetup walk.



Celebrate the New Year in the Blue Hills. This is year 20 of the DCR's annual New Yearâ€™s tradition! Join the fun. Last year they had bonfires to warm up by.
Warm up with a free cup of hearty soup, then stretch your legs on a variety of guided hikes suitable for all ages and abilities. A great way to jump start the year! For more information, call 617-698-1802.

If you miss our group, you can join one of the various DCR led hikes which all start a half hour later.
item.name: First Day Hike with the DCR in Blue Hills
